title: HealthPlanFormulary
description: For a given health insurance plan, the specification for costs and coverage of prescription drugs.

allOf.description: A utility class that serves as the umbrella for a number of 'intangible' things such as quantities, structured values, etc.

healthPlanCostSharing.description: Whether The costs to the patient for services under this network or formulary.

healthPlanDrugTier.description: The tier(s) of drugs offered by this formulary or insurance plan.

offersPrescriptionByMail.description: Whether prescriptions can be delivered by mail.
